column7: The study of music written for and performed by a small instrumental ensemble with one player per part. Students will be assigned to chamber groups that will be coached on a weekly basis by members of the faculty. At least one public performance per term may be required. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in the same semester up to 2 hours; in separate semesters to a maximum of 16 undergraduate hours and 12 graduate hours. Prerequisite: Music majors or consent of instructor.
